metadata.title: CVE-2024-22368 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
The Spreadsheet::ParseXLSX package before 0.28 for Perl can encounter anout-of-memory condition during parsing of a crafted XLSX document. Thisoccurs because the memoize implementation does not have appropriateconstraints on merged cells.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-22368` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libspreadsheet-parsexlsx-perl - 0.27-2+deb10u1build0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libspreadsheet-parsexlsx-perl package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.27-2+deb10u1build0.20.04.1').
